author: cnbc.com
title: Webcast Alert: Olympic Steel to Announce 2018 First-Quarter Financial Results Before Market Opens on May 3
text:
Conference Call to Be Held 9 a.m. ET Same Day
CLEVELAND--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Olympic Steel, Inc. (Nasdaq: ZEUS) , a leading national metals service center, invites you to participate in its conference call to discuss 2018 first-quarter results.
When:
Thursday, May 3, 2018, at 9 a.m. Eastern Time Hosts:
Michael D. Siegal, Chairman & CEO David A. Wolfort, President Richard T. Marabito, CFO Web Address:
www.olysteel.com
Contact:
Matthew J. Dennis, CFA Olympic Steel Investor Relations, (216) 672-0522 The Company intends to release its 2018 first-quarter financial results before the market opens on May 3, 2018. If you are unable to listen to the live call, a webcast will be archived and available for replay at www.olysteel.com .
About Olympic Steel
Founded in 1954, Olympic Steel is a leading U.S. metals service center focused on the direct sale and distribution of large volumes of processed carbon, coated and stainless flat-rolled sheet, coil and plate steel, aluminum, and tin products. The Company’s CTI subsidiary is a leading distributor of steel tubing, bar, pipe, valves and fittings, and fabricates pressure parts for the electric utility industry. Headquartered in Cleveland, Ohio, Olympic Steel operates from 31 facilities in North America.
For additional information, please visit the Company’s website at www.olysteel.com or http://ir.olysteel.com/Contact_Us?BzID=2195
